content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello, Yi-Nuo Wang. It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment in Duisburg to be a comfortable and convenient place to live. Let's discuss the rental price. What is your budget?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm a student so I'm on a tight budget. I was thinking of around 400 euros a month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but that's much lower than my asking price. The location of this apartment is prime, and I'm looking for a tenant who can appreciate its value. How about we start at 600 euros per month? This is a fair price considering the amenities and the central location. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a big difference. I think 450 euros is more reasonable. I can also sign a two-year contract.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hmm, 450 euros is still quite low for this area. The apartment is brand new and in a highly sought-after location. I'm sure you'll enjoy the proximity to public transportation and amenities. Let's meet in the middle at 525 euros per month. This is a good deal for you, considering the long-term contract and the quality of the apartment. What say you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your counter-offer. I can do 500 euros per month. I can also pay six months' rent upfront.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Thank you for your offer. While the upfront payment is attractive, I'm still looking for a higher monthly rent. How about 550 euros per month? This is a fair price for both parties, as it reflects the value of the apartment while also recognizing your commitment with the upfront payment. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because we are too far apart on the price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand your position, Yi-Nuo. However, I'm looking for a tenant who can appreciate the value of this prime location and brand-new apartment. If you're not willing to meet in the middle, I respect your decision. We will terminate the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
